condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Research, policies, plans and alternative pathways create an enabling environment for early learning and ten years of education for the most disadvantaged children

description.narrative: Progress was achieved on improvements to data management for planning, monitoring and accountability, and improved student assessments. Upstream interventions augmented education platforms, ECE and NFE policy development, and preparations for education sector planning in two provinces. Area studies on out of school children were disseminated to influence education strategies. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2017
